==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|む|こく|せき}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=むこくせき|無|tr1=mu|t1=without, -less|国籍|tr2=kokuseki|t2=nationality, citizenship}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|むこくせき|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むこくせき}}

# {{l|en|statelessness}}, the {{l|en|condition}} of having no {{l|en|citizenship}}

====Usage notes====
Used with the particle {{ja-r|の}} to modify another noun:
: {{ja-usex|'''無国籍'''の避難者|'''むこくせき''' の ひなんしゃ|a '''stateless''' refugee}}
Also used as a component in kanji compounds:
: {{ja-usex|'''無国籍'''者|'''むこくせき'''しゃ|a '''stateless''' person}}
